body:
So I'm here again with players asking me ingame, on TS, and on Skype to help them rush. Well you can now join the rushing group -  We also work together to create new techniques and Routes/Paths on specific maps 

Note this is not a clan, it is a group to help players 

First Answer these Questions:
1. What is Your Skype?
2. Why are you in need of assistance to attack better?
3. What Map(s)(Max 5) Do you want to improve in?
